Class casino

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.World
      casino

public class casino
extends greenfoot.World

Casino style Slot Machine Game. Casino : This is the main class. It works as the main scenario for all Actors All the processes in the game are visible here.

Version:
12/15/2010
Author:
Saksham Ghimire and Densai Moua
